Package game.character

Class Player

java.lang.Object
game.character.Entity
game.character.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity, IPlayer
public class Player extends Entity implements IPlayer
The Player class represents a player in the game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class game.character.Entity

    currentRoom, health, power

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(String name)
    Constructs a player with a name and a default initial room.

    Constructs a player with a name and initial room, and sets the backpack.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void

    Attacks all enemies in the current room, dealing damage equal to the player's power.

    • useItem

      public void useItem() throws EmptyBackPackException
      Uses an item from the backpack to restore health. The player's health is limited at 100.
      Specified by:
      useItem in interface IPlayer
      Throws:
      EmptyBackPackException - If the backpack is empty.

    • collectItem

      public void collectItem(Item item)
      Collects an item from the room and adds it to the player's backpack. If the item is a Shield, it adds extra health to the player. If the item is a HealthKit, it is stored in the backpack.
      Specified by:
      collectItem in interface IPlayer
      Parameters:
      item - The item to be collected.

    • getBackpack

      public Backpack getBackpack()
      Returns the player's backpack.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
      The player's backpack.
